title: Marriyum grieved over demise of senior journalistâ€™s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 14 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Wednesday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the demise of the mother of senior journalist Zahid Malik.
The minister, in a condolence message, prayed to the Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear loss with fortitude.
She also sympathized with the bereaved family.
